faqs.question: How can I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Enter your registered email address to receive a reset link, then follow the instructions to set a new password.

faqs.question: How do I update my account information?
faqs.answer: You can update your profile details by logging into your account, going to 'Profile Settings', and clicking 'Edit Profile'.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, UPI, PayPal, and net banking for all purchases.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: After your order ships, you'll receive a tracking link via email or SMS. You can also track it anytime from the 'My Orders' section in your account.

faqs.question: I didn't receive a tracking link. What should I do?
faqs.answer: If you haven't received a tracking link within 24 hours of placing your order, please check your spam folder or contact customer support for assistance.

faqs.question: Why is my order taking longer than expected?
faqs.answer: Delivery delays can happen due to high demand or courier issues. Please check your order’s tracking page for real-time updates.

faqs.question: Can I change my delivery address after placing an order?
faqs.answer: You can modify your delivery address before the order is shipped by contacting our support team.

faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM IST. Support is also available on Saturdays from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM.

faqs.question: Do you provide support on weekends or holidays?
faqs.answer: Limited support is available on weekends and public holidays. You can still leave a message, and our team will respond on the next working day.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We accept returns within 7 days of delivery if the product is unused and in its original packaging. Refunds are issued after quality inspection.

faqs.question: How do I request a return or exchange?
faqs.answer: Go to 'My Orders', select the item, and click 'Return/Exchange'. Follow the on-screen instructions to schedule a pickup or replacement.

faqs.question: When will I get my refund after returning an item?
faqs.answer: Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days after the returned item passes inspection.

faqs.question: Are there items that can't be returned?
faqs.answer: Yes, perishable goods, digital products, and personalized items are non-returnable unless they arrive damaged or defective.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com, chat with us through the Help section, or call us at +91-99999-99999 during business hours.

faqs.question: Do you have live chat support?
faqs.answer: Yes, live chat is available on our website during business hours for quick help with any queries.

faqs.question: Can I speak directly to a human representative?
faqs.answer: If the bot cannot resolve your issue, your query will automatically be escalated to a human support representative.

faqs.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged or wrong product?
faqs.answer: Please report the issue within 48 hours of delivery through your order page or by contacting support. We’ll arrange a replacement or refund.

faqs.question: Is my personal information secure?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We use secure encryption protocols and comply with data protection standards to keep your information safe.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: Yes, refunds are issued for eligible cancellations or returns according to our Refund Policy.

faqs.question: What happens if my query isn't resolved by the bot?
faqs.answer: If your question can't be answered automatically, it will be escalated to a human support agent for personalized assistance.
